mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_PBI_JIS( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, EMPLOYER, EMPLOYER_TYPE, OCCUPATION_TYPE, POSITION_TYPE, TITLE_TYPE, INFOR_UNIT, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{employer}, #{employerType}, #{occupationType}, #{positionType}, #{titleType}, #{inforUnit}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
